metadata.name: ARKHAUS Forever Membership #5
metadata.description:
This token provides the holder a Forever Membership to ARKHAUS Miami - a floating private membership club, herein known as "ARKHAUS". See the details below

KEY ARTWORK  
Provided by Julian Castro (IG: @juliancastro.art)

EXPLORE ARKHAUS  
https://arkhaus.miami 

REFUNDABILITY  
via Side Agreement Prior to bidding, you can optionally sign the below agreement to ensure that if ARKHAUS does not materialize per the terms of this Side Agreement, your NFT proceeds (less fees) are refundable.  
https://bit.ly/arkhausforevermembershipnftsideagreement

MEMBERSHIP DETAILS  
Refer to: arkhaus.miami or http://arkhaus.miami/memberships/ 
While you may trade this NFT whenever you please, the associated Forever Membership can only be transferred once per year. This is to prevent repetitive transactions to provide access to multiple people.

CLUB ACCESS  
All Forever Memberships will receive immediate access to the club on Opening Day. Annual Members will receivedaccess at different times based on 1) their membership number and 2) the arrival of the 4 vessels.

MEMBER APPLICATION  
While annual membership requires an application (with no guarantees of acceptance), Forever Memberships do not and are guaranteed acceptance.

BACKGROUND CHECK  
While annual memberships require a background check to ensure the highest quality membership, Forever Memberships do not require a background check.

FOREVER vs ANNUAL MEMBERSHIPS  
Compare here: http://arkhaus.miami/memberships/

CODE OF CONDUCT  
All members are expected to abide by a basic Code of Conduct. Repeat offenders may be expelled from their membership. By purchasing this NFT, you agree to abide by the final Code of Conduct that all members agree to abide by.
